Module project
Package project.LogicClasses

Class StudentDAO

java.lang.Object
project.LogicClasses.StudentDAO
public class StudentDAO extends Object
The StudentDAO class provides methods for interacting with the database for operations related to students and grades.

      parola - The password for verification.
      Returns:
